item.title: Cruise line reverses course on requiring jabs for passengers...
item.description:
local12.com
MIAMI (CNN/CNN Newsource/WKRC) - The cruise industry is getting ready to set sail once again but a political storm brewing on land – one between Florida Governor Ron DeSantis and the Centers for Disease Control – suggests it will be anything but smooth sailing. Right now, most cruise lines are advertising new summer sailings with vaccination requirements. But Royal Caribbean abruptly changed course on Friday. Only its ships departing from Seattle and the Bahamas on or before Aug.

item.title: Manchin's opposition clouds future of Dem bill...
item.description:

WASHINGTON (AP) — A key Democratic senator says he will not vote for the largest overhaul of U.S. election law in at least a generation, leaving no plausible path forward for legislation that his party and the White House have portrayed as crucial for protecting access to the ballot.
